name: Bub Block (itch)
description:
Bub Block is a frantic, local multiplayer battle where players try to trap each other with bricks while avoiding spinning blades. Each round is fully customizable, from how fast the blades move to how many bricks you can carry to the ability to turn into a ghost and seek revenge after you die.

Keep in mind that this is a direct port of the Xbox indie version released in 2012. As such, an Xbox controller is required to play! There is no keyboard support. There is no single-player mode, either. Please bring friends!

Audio Extras:

The original soundtrack by Boost Power is freely available at Bandcamp.
The game's sound effects are also provided, royalty free, at OpenGameArt.
